author: chouhan raaj chouhan
comment: Very very much good for every Google user
Super app. It's like a lifeline for people on the move.

author: avik das
comment: How to add new route??

author: Natraja S.K
comment: Best.

author: Wesley Whalen
comment: This was the best navigation app by far. But after the last update and went from a five-star app to a one or two star app. The last update took away route alternatives. and now the ability to pan around the map and find an alternative manually isnt really an option either since it keeps snapping back to the direction it wants to go instead of letting me move it manually and just recenter  when I'm done. Hoping Google fixes it and I'm sure they will but for now 1 star again

author: Richard Bolden
comment: Map is terrible at expected delays. Told us we were on fastest route with 13 minute delay for construction. It is 45 minutes later and we still have not even gotten to the construction. How do you cl come up with your estimates? We would have taken an alternate route.

author: Gregory Ross
comment: This formerly 5 star app has failed on this latest update. Errors saying "Something went wrong. Can't get directions there right now." and going blank in the middle of navigation. It has failed 5 times in 2 days. It added 45 minutes to a 12 hour trip. Needs serious repair work.

I am giving 1 star  to get the attention of authority.   Google Maps doesn't show the proper location of a school (A P Nagaur Atul Krishna Roy Vidyayatan For Girls, A P Nagaur, Sonarpur, North 24 Parganas, Narayanpur Road, Paschatya Para, Harinavi, Kolkata, West Bengal 700150) from subhasgram station. For this I get trouble to reach at this school for a job examination..  If the authority of Google Maps notice my review n slove this problem then students like me can get a benifit.  Please help google

author: tom cox
comment: Hate this latest update. Everything works up to the looking for directions. Stops looking saying error. Look later. Have tried uploading five times in different areas and same results. I clear upload and go back to original map and it's works. Been using this app for years and now new update doesn't work? HELP!

The blue dot with an aerial view is totally useless, dot never turns into an arrow besides the coordinates are not getting updated even after calibrating compass. Please alert the user before updating so he won't screw up his working app. Old version was way better than new one, this doesn't even work

author: Maria Tellidou
comment: I recently moved to Gdansk Poland and it is impossible to move around using GM!  As much as it seems complicated the local transport system, i find it absurd that not even the bus/tram stops can be found on the map! At least there are other apps but with other cities and regions in europe so far i didn't have such problems.  You have to work hard and fast on this matter!!

author: Timothy Sin
comment: Certain places it will lose signal. Need to have the start and end time option like the browser version. Would be nice to have a feature that calculate the shortest route among stops. Need to have an option allowing no highway routing because sometimes highway is super congested so going local is faster

author: Robin Davis
comment: Update - I've used this app alot on recent trips and have had difficulty with gas stations and restaurants not easily showing up. Also it seems a lot harder to see highway exit numbers and street names on Maps. It is excellent for navigation.

author: Eric Travers
comment: Location sharing is and probably always will be terrible. It will tell me my wife is in Mississippi as she is pulling in to the driveway here in Florida. Could be a problem for someone with a [jealous|suspicious|paranoid] spouse. Needs more accuracy. Everything else is great.

author: Prateek Das
comment: Nothing can come close to this magical app. Ultimate database and ultimate coverage. There is almost no place on earth where this map won't have any knowledge about. I've used numerous  expensive satguides before, but none come close to this. Thank you Google!

author: Janson McCreery
comment: Latest few updates have made it extremely laggy and slow. I have a galaxy s7 edge and it runs poorly. I recently had my phone replaced and did a fresh install of my apps with no change in Google maps performance.

author: Nina Grace
comment: This realty is a great app. I'm sure there are still mistakes or lack of information in very remote areas, but its so much better than it was initially. The feature that allows users to upload images and add additional comments is a really nice feature. Thank you Google Maps!

author: Angel Rodriguez
comment: This application change the street name of my community and now my house address is lost. This creates issues with receiving services. People can not find my house and they refuse to provide services to me. Placed several emails to the people of Google Maps +3 months no response from you. This socks.

author: Landon Moore
comment: I like the maps and being able to see satellite views to help find places haven't been to before. Though if use it to find out about business or restaurant  it may be useless. I looked at restaurant and had some information 5+ years out of date. So find out where going but don't trust info about place lol

author: Pavel Komolov
comment: the Directions and start button have become so tucked away and small that starting a trip is a pain in the ass. you literally have to press stuff 5-7 times before it goes into Navi mode. Still hasn't changed. Just let me pick address and hit Go and I'll be happy

author: Mike Drews
comment: I wish this app had the real time aspect and speed limits like Waze. As an example, I live near several schools off of a two lane road. This app shows the road is red 24/7 when it's only backed up 7:30 to 8:30am and 2:30 to 3:30pm. I find Waze too busy and annoying but find myself using it more and more because the info is fresh and in real time.

author: Josh Vogler
comment: Ever since the major redesign years ago, Maps jas been terrible. Still can't even orient to your direction of travel well and spins around while driving based on the poor compass in today's phones. I remember when Google had the best programmers available. Now it seems they employ people based on everything except their programming & code writing ability, and ALL their Android apps reflect this...with persistent bugs and un-tested releases regularly.

author: Uncle Gregy
comment: I use this app every day for my job and I absolutely love it.  It is, by far, the best navigator I have used.  With that said, it is certainly not perfect.  Sometimes addresses are not marked or are in the wrong location, even homes that have been around for a while.  Voice directions could use some work as well.  Instead of saying "Milwaukee" it says "M-I-L waukee".  Or instead of saying "County road A-B" I get "County road Alberta".  One thing I would like to see added to the map is county lines.

author: Warren Topping
comment: Works decent but could use some features that others have. It's great and works really good online but offline it has some features that are not very good. If you go offline and deviate from your planned path it has a very hard time rerouting and may not reroute it all.

author: Abraham George
comment: App is great but the last few times I have used the app, it isn't giving me the routes correctly, neither is the location tracking in sync with my Movement. This is in Bahrain. Pls help with better updates. Also live voice directions are not enabled though the phone - Note8- settings are enabled. Pls Help

author: Stanley F
comment: Google maps works great! I love that it shows you which lane you need to be on when you're getting ready to exit the interstate or make a turn in a busy city. Thus is very helpful when you don't know where you're going. The only improvement I would make is to allow drivers to report on traffic, accidents, etc, like Waze. This would get the info to Google maps faster than getting it from Waze.

author: Shannon Perez
comment: The latest update is horrible. When I hide the app I don't want to see alittle map in the corner of my screen. Give me the option to turn this off. Please take this option out

author: anthony Reyes
comment: Google map used to be the best, but now between waze and ios google map has probably become number three. Because those two apps lane assistants and speed limit and more things which is something google map does not have.

Package installer fails locking up app. Why do you think you need to install anything past the base app. So it can ping information back home, so you can build a database for advertising directly to me, so you can profit off of peoples private lives instead of selling products to people and not corporations for a profit like honest people do? Terrible app, obviously paid reviews making it seem better than it is. Congrats you're just another Trump of software.

author: Marcie Hampton
comment: It gives the most arbitrary routes possible with public transportation. It like picked a route for you and then it skips the hour and gives you alternate routes in the next hour not for right now you to really have to know what options for public transport are to figure out the best route. It's like the app gets confused.

author: sherlock holmes
comment: Every time I try to minimize the app while navigating an annoying pop up interactive map appears that I have to swipe closed.  Incredibly annoying and dangerous for those who are driving.  When I want to minimize Google map I WANT the app minimized!!!

author: A Google User
comment: Used to be really good. Would tell you what direction to almost as soon as you put in your destination. Now it just sits on the map with a blue dot that isn't very accurate and takes forever now to acquire the GPS location.

author: hasmukh Boricha
comment: Google maps publisher, Why many places photos captured and posted by me deleted by you?????  Not happy why??   Some time not working properly, badges give by them very late update , today I know that some photos I captured in my mobile phone and posted in Google maps shown as in name google.inc. I was wondering how Google use it.and some photos I posted in different types of names and it change in other names....???? Why??? Google maps doing it???

author: Landon Dial
comment: This app gets consistently worse almost every day. It will never give me an accurate time anymore. It's seriously always around 8-10 minutes late. Additionally, it never gives me the fastest times. I'll start to follow the route, notice it's too slow myself, take a different route, and the time will drop on Maps. The location sharing also is terrible. It won't update for 19 hours sometimes. No sure what happened with this app but it's awful now.

author: Danielle Shaw
comment: I would give this app zero stars if I could. Been stuck in traffic for the past 4 hours because the map failed to mention a bridge closure that occurred hours prior.

author: juan martinez
comment: google team in charge of this should be fired for their stupidity. How are you going to use this for navigation when you can no longer make a distinction between roads and land? you know dark lines on a map are there for a very good reason? so we have an idea where it ends or begins. you make it all as close to white as possible then no one can tell where they should be turning or ending at. Well done you all!

Since recent update the app seems to be having trouble getting traffic data - often shows up no information on map overlay and shows the 'offline' cloud when provide routing information. But at least it now seems to understand roundabouts properly again, after a long spell of showing 'straight ahead' as 'turn right'.

author: Tom Mersy
comment: When u have not chosen directions, u can click and hold anywhere on the map and it will show a street view image of it, but when u have directions u can not click and hold anywhere on the map to see street view! (update this then I will give u 5 stars, thanks)

author: Kiran Kumaar
comment: Comparing to old version, the updated new version is not good enough. In the old version, direction arrow will be there and in new version a dot will be there to know our current location. So people can't recognize that in which direction they are standing. If it is old version, the arrow will show their direction.

author: Husrav Homids
comment: Giving 3 stars so devs can see. I've been using Android since I switched from Symbian back in the days. Phones are fast now. But man this app freezes bad sometimes. Especially when I try to add new destination after arriving to the first one, it works so slow I can't even type in the address. My phone is fine, up to date and clear. But this thing is so bad sometimes. Do something with it please
